body:
It turns out iterators don't work either.

Templating doesn't work because in all cases except TensorList, you want to take a reference to avoid refcount bump; but for TensorList, we need to implicit construct a Variable to get the types to line up.

(And yes, I've complained about the fact we take TensorList instead of VariableList, but I am not fixing this the current commit...)

body_text:
It turns out iterators don't work either.
Templating doesn't work because in all cases except TensorList, you want to take a reference to avoid refcount bump; but for TensorList, we need to implicit construct a Variable to get the types to line up.
(And yes, I've complained about the fact we take TensorList instead of VariableList, but I am not fixing this the current commit...)
